version_description: -Bug fixes and performance improvements.

-Added Green Screen & Chroma Key: Replace video & photo background with our newly-added chroma key.

-Added Intro Video Templates: One tap to make creative intros for your videos.

-Bug fixes and performance improvements.
-Added Green Screen Video Templates: One tap to make creative green screen materials for your projects.

-Importing music from iTunes and local files is now available in Motion Ninja.

-Added the feature of Freeze Frame. Capture any moment you like and make it emphasized.

-Added more trending stickers and green screen videos.

-Bug fixes and performance improvements.

-Move to Clip/Picture-in-Picture: Switch videos & photos between clip and picture-in-picture or vice versa directly during editing.

-Optimizations for text typing: Add stroke, shadow and background to text.

-Added easy-to-follow tutorials to help you be adept in Motion Ninja quickly.

-Added new intro & green screen templates.
-Bug fixes and performance improvements.

-Optimizations for applying Loop, In & Out animation effects. Make custom animations to show off your creativity!

-Optimizations for moving to Clip/Picture-in-Picture by gestures.

-Added new green screen templates.
-Added new 3D green screen templates.

-Curve edits for keyframes now support: Mask, Filter, Adjustment.
-Improvement for Keyframe animation editing.
-More keyframe tutorials for Mask, Mirror, Motion Blur.

-FX Effects are adjustable now! Feeling the effects are too strong? Now you can adjust it to the way you like.
-FX Effects supports keyframe editing! Add keyframes to make custom effects for your creative edits!
-Add new FX Effects.

-3D FX Effects are here! Turn your pictures or videos into 3D Box, Flip-layer, Cube, Sphere.
-FX & 3D Effects supports keyframe editing! Add keyframes to make custom animations & effects for your creative edits!
-FX Effects are adjustable now! Feeling the effects are too strong? Now you can adjust it to the way you like.

-Keyframe Editing Improvement: Support keyframes moving, keyframe value entering. Make keyframe editing faster and more conveniently!
-New Keyframe Curves: Add Bounce, Steps, Random curves for keyframe editing.
-Custom Curves: You can adjust keyframe curves by yourself! Create animations as you like!
-Ideas: Video tutorials to inspire you to make interesting edits!
-A Few UI Improvements.

- New Al Effects:Danger,Volcano,Underwater.
- Add Optical Flow interpolation: You can make Smooth SlowMotion to create smoother slow videos as professionals.
- Improved UI, fixed bugs and optimized editing experience.

-Add Saber effects: You can add glowing frame to videos or pictures. And able to make glowing text now!
-Add more 3D effects: Unfolded cube, Ball, Rings and more.
-Add Getting Started tutorials: Help you understand how to edit with Motion Ninja faster.

-Add New Glow effects: You can add glowing frame to videos or pictures. 
-Performance improvement & Bug fixed.

-Added Saber special effects
-Performance improvement & Bug fixed.

-Add Saber Moduleï¼šyou can make glowing frames or glowing title with Saber effects
-Performance improvement & Bug fixed.

In this version, we have upgraded Motion Ninja significantly! Now it is more powerful for making premium custom effects and animations.
-You can add multiple effects to one layer, like combining 3D Flip & Saber.
-You can add effects to clipboard and paste to other layers.
-You can edit keyframes and curves of different features independently.
-You can choose project settings before started.
-Update tutorials of Saber and Shapes.
-Optimize editing process and interface.

Update Now and try better editing experience!!

-Add Magic Sky Effects. You can apply diverse sky effects such as Nebula, Meteor and Space effects.
-Add Scatter Effects. You can make particles drifting over a picture.
-Add Pro Color Grading, offer you professional Color Grading experience.
-Add new Meta Effects that help you customize diverse animations: Squeeze, Radius Rays, Lens distortion, Polar coordinates.
-Add Public section for you to check out news of Motion Ninja and well edits of our users. Come join our weekly challenge!
-Increase the maximum number of speed curve beats in Smooth SlowMo.
-Add Hue and Sharpen in the Adjust menu.
-Performance improvement & Bug fixed.

-Add Halloween stickers.
-Add Magic Sky Effects. You can apply diverse sky effects such as Nebula, Meteor and Space effects.
-Add Scatter Effects. You can make particles drifting over a picture.
-Add Pro Color Grading, offer you professional Color Grading experience.
-Add new Meta Effects that help you customize diverse animations: Squeeze, Radius Rays, Lens distortion, Polar coordinates.
-Add Public section for you to check out news of Motion Ninja and well edits of our users. Come join our weekly challenge!
-Increase the maximum number of speed curve beats in Smooth SlowMo.
-Add Hue and Sharpen in the Adjust menu.
-Performance improvement & Bug fixed.
